NEST

Documentation

Match All Query

A query that matches all documents. Maps to Lucene MatchAllDocsQuery.

.From(0)
.Size(10)
.Query(q => q.MatchAll());

A special shortcut exists for matchall queries

.From(0)
.Size(10)
.MatchAll()
